meanings.definition: To move with high, springy steps
meanings.sent1: The little bunny pranced around the garden happily.
meanings.sent2: The horse pranced gracefully in the field.
meanings.sent3: The cat pranced around the room, chasing its tail.
meanings.sent4: The leaves pranced in the wind, swirling and twirling.
meanings.sent5: The children pranced joyfully in the playground, full of energy.

meanings.definition: To dance or move in a lively or spirited manner
meanings.sent1: The excited dog pranced around its owner, wagging its tail.
meanings.sent2: The performers pranced on stage, captivating the audience with their moves.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel pranced in the tree, showing off its acrobatic skills.
meanings.sent4: The flames pranced in the fireplace, flickering and dancing.
meanings.sent5: The waves pranced along the shore, playful and rhythmic.
